page.title: 03Honey Farm In Cwmdare
page.content: Tyn-Y-Waun Honey Farm is a private industry run by Mr.and Mrs.Dublon.They have a large house and they also keep pigs,ducks,chickens and dogs. They keep 200 boxes of bees.In each box there is one queen bee,2_300 dromes and around 60,000 workers.All of his bees are not kept in Mr. Dublon's home.His boxes cover an area from Neath to Brecon.At 5:00 every morning Mr.Dublon takes his bees to various place where they can collect nectar.The bees feed on a yellow flower called "Oil Seed Rape".The bees at Mr.Dublon's farm travel to the surrounding fields for a distance of 2 miles to feed.
